description: Watermelon and lime make a refreshing and naturally sweet frozen treat. Easy and delicious.
name: Watermelon Lime Popsicles - No Added Sugar!
recipeIngredient: 1 large lime – peeled and pith removed (if you don’t want the pulp from the lime squeeze the juice in the blender)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the watermelon and the lime in a high powered blender and blend until smooth. Pour in the popsicle molds, cover and place the sticks in and freeze overnight.
If you have leftover juice, just drink it!
